GR13kirtc_pu:2832: evaṃ sthiterbhaṅge jāte sati na kiñcitsyāditi vakṣyamāṇaprāyaścittākrāntatvāt tasya na dīkṣāphalaṃ samanantaraṃ syāt/
GR13kirtc_pu:2833: prāyaścittavighnākrāntatvāditi tena kāraṇenāyaṃ jñānādīnāṃ nityānuṣṭheyatayā puruṣārthatvena niyamaḥ sthita iti/
GR13kirtc_pu:2835: tadante tu viśuddhajñānakevalitvena parameśvarādanugrahastāvato 'pi malasya dravyatvena
GR13kirtc_pu:2836: svato nivṛttyasaṃbhavādityevaṃ sthityupāyavivakṣayāpi sarveṣāṃ pariṇatamalānāmanugrāhako bhagavānityadoṣaḥ /
GR13kirtc_pu:2840: viśleṣo 'pi na dṛśyeta adṛṣṭatvātkathaṃ vada // KirT_6.15 //
GR13kirtc_pu:2844: karmaṇāṃ ca pāśānāṃ dīkṣayā viśleṣo na sambhavet/
GR13kirtc_pu:2853: yasmātpāśastobhakarma prāyaścittātmakamucyate tasmātkṣayo duṣkṛtalakṣaṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ yena bhavatāṃ siddhaḥ tenātra prathamo heturanaikāntika
GR13kirtc_pu:2855: mantrāṇāṃ ca samyaksiddhānāmacintyaśaktitvādviṣakṣayādiriva so 'pi pāśaviśleṣādiḥ sambhāvyata ityadoṣaḥ/
GR13kirtc_pu:2866: atra dūrasthito 'pi kāminyādirarthaḥ tannāmnā saṅkīrttitamātreṇa mantraviśeṣaiḥ sādhyamāno dṛṣṭaḥ/
GR13kirtc_pu:2873: tathaiva śarīrāntarabhogyasvakarmākāla eva mantrabalādupasthāpitamupabhuktatvāttatraiva kṣayameṣyatīti na doṣaḥ kaścit/
GR13kirtc_pu:2879: yadi dīkṣayā karmādisarvapāśavicchittirbhavet tato nimittābhāvāddīkṣitānāṃ śarīraṃ na bhavet/
GR13kirtc_pu:2892: ghaṭasya niṣpattyarthaṃ hi cakrabhramaṇaṃ tasyāṃ jātāyāṃ sampannāyāmapi yathā tatsaṃskārata
GR13kirtc_pu:2893: eva cakrabhramaṇaṃ dṛśyate tathā sadyonirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ karmādisarvapāśakṣaye 'pi tatsaṃskāreṇaiva
GR13kirtc_pu:2894: dīkṣitānāṃ kiyantaṃ kālaṃ śarīraṃ tiṣṭhatīti nimittābhāvādityasya hetostatkālanaimittikābhāvāsiddhāvanaikāntikatvānna
GR13kirtc_pu:2903: bhaviṣyadapi saṃruddhaṃ yenedaṃ taddhi bhogataḥ // KirT_6.20 //
GR13kirtc_pu:2905: kāryāṇubhiḥ sadā siddhais tena te śivayojakāḥ // KirT_6.21 //
GR13kirtc_pu:2907: sadyonirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ tāvatsarvāṇyeva prāgarjitāni karmāṇi mantraśaktitaḥ phalāprasavenāpyakāla eva bhogataḥ kṣayaṃ nīyanta ityuktam/
GR13kirtc_pu:2908: asadyonirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ tu sadyomumukṣoranadhikārānna tasya śarīrasya vināśāya mantrāḥ prayujyante/
GR13kirtc_pu:2909: api tu rakṣaṇāyaiva yasmādyenedaṃ karmaṇā yathā ca śarīramārabdhaṃ tasya bhogenaiva kṣayaḥ/
GR13kirtc_pu:2912: yataḥ prakṛtau karmaṇāṃ saṃskāraḥ kārya ityuktam/
GR13kirtc_pu:2913: ataśca sarva eva mantraśaktyā dīkṣitaṃ prati dagdhabījāḥ sampannāste karmaviśeṣāḥ/
GR13kirtc_pu:2914: na punastatsaṃskārapātratāṃ yāntīti sadyonirvāṇadīkṣāyāñcārādhitamantrasāmarthyatastatkṣaye 'pi cakrabhramavaddhṛtaśarīrāvasthiteruktatvānna dīkṣānantarameva śarīrapātadoṣa iti/
GR13kirtc_pu:2917: pāśamuktasya yaccihnaṃ svalpamapyatra kiṃ na tat /
GR13kirtc_pu:2918: dṛśyate bhakticihnena na ca cihnaṃ kvacitsphuṭam // KirT_6.22 //
GR13kirtc_pu:2921: yadyevamasadyonirvāṇadīkṣayaitaccharīrabhogapradakarmapāśāmuktvatve 'pi tasya malādyanyapāśamuktatve yaccihnamavinābhāvi sarvajñatvādikaṃ tatsvalpamapi kathaṃ na dṛśyate/
GR13kirtc_pu:2923: pāśamuktatvasiddhiriti punarapi dīkṣāphalaśruteḥ pramāṇāntareṇaiva bādhāt aprāmāṇyamiti praśnārthaḥ /
GR13kirtc_pu:2924: na ca vācyaṃ bāhyacihnāntareṇa bhaktyātmanāsau pāśamukto dṛśyata iti yato na kvacittatpāśamuktasya caitaccihnamuktam/
GR13kirtc_pu:2926: sphuṭaṃ ca kṛtvā yatrāpi śaktipātayukte taccihnaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tatrāpyasya vyabhicāritetyuktaṃ prāk tirobhāvakarī śaktirityādinā/
GR13kirtc_pu:2930: sarvathā pāśamuktasya liṅgādarśanenāsiddheḥ prokta eva doṣa iti prathamaḥ praśnaḥ/
GR13kirtc_pu:2932: prāguktaṃ yojanaṃ tasya tadyuktyā grāhapūrvakam // KirT_6.23 //
GR13kirtc_pu:2934: mahānatra virodhaḥ syāt kathametadbravīhi me // KirT_6.24 //
GR13kirtc_pu:2939: tadayuktaṃ yato yasya pratyakṣeṇa paricchedātmakaṃ grahaṇaṃ
GR13kirtc_pu:2942: svīkārātmakaṃ ca sambhavati tasya yojanaṃ devadattāderiva rājādau/
GR13kirtc_pu:2944: atha śarīradvāreṇa tasya tau bhavata ityucyate yaduktaṃ prāk sūkṣmadehavivakṣayeti/
GR13kirtc_pu:2947: tadapyayuktaṃ yatastatheti tasyāpyasmadādigrahaṇaṃ na sambhavati amūrtatvāt/
GR13kirtc_pu:2951: grahaṇe hi tasya bāndhavādibhiraparityāgātpuṃsāṃ maraṇādyanupapattirityatrādṛṣṭenaiva tato 'smadādigrahaṇaṃ vyāvartyate/ yadāhuḥ
GR13kirtc_pu:2957: tadevamātmanaḥ sarvathā grahaṇābhāvena saṃyojanādyabhāvātparapuruṣārthaikaprāptyupāyatvenoktāyā dīkṣāyā anupapattermahānvirodha iti dvitīyaḥ
GR13kirtc_pu:2962: ayamartho 'sadyonirvāṇadīkṣāyāṃ tāvadetaccharīrabhogapradaṃ karma puṃso na kṣapaṇīyamityuktam/
GR13kirtc_pu:2963: malena ca kāryakaraṇaiśca vinā bhogānupapatterarthānmalasya sūkṣmadehasya ca na sarvātmanā viccheda iti pratīyate/
GR13kirtc_pu:2964: api tu tadbhogoparodhena vāsanātmanāṃśena viccheda iti tatra sarvātmanā pāśāntaravicchedasyāpyasiddheḥ śivatvavyaktyasambhavāttaccihnaṃ sarvajñatvādi na dṛśyata ityadhyāhāraḥ/
GR13kirtc_pu:2966: yattu cihnāntaramapi tasya nopalabhyata ityuktaṃ tadayuktaṃ yato yā malaliṅgayoranayoranayā
GR13kirtc_pu:2967: dīkṣayā pariśeṣitāṃśamātrarūpā vāsanetyuktaṃ tasyā niṣṭhāntyo vināśaḥ tadarthaṃ yatkarma
GR13kirtc_pu:2968: nityanaimittikamaniṣiddhaṃ jñānakriyācaryātmakaṃ prāk pratipāditaṃ tasminnavikalpanā vikalpābhāvaḥ /
GR13kirtc_pu:2970: anyathā tathābhūtatvānupapattiriti na tadabhāvāttasya pāśamuktatvāsiddheḥ proktadoṣa iti/
GR13kirtc_pu:2972: tanusthaṃ hi kathaṃ caitat spandenāpyanumīyate // KirT_6.25 //
GR13kirtc_pu:2974: yadā vibhutvādātmano grahaṇaṃ na sambhavatīti ayaṃ hetvarthastadā tanusthamiti kāryakaraṇābhivyaktaṃ
GR13kirtc_pu:2977: tathā svātmavadanyātmanyapi parispandeneti kāyavāgvyavahārādinā talliṅgenānumīyate gṛhyata iti tenāpyanaikāntikaḥ/
GR13kirtc_pu:2979: vibhutve khaṃ yathā śabdād amūrtaṃ hi viṣaṃ yathā /
GR13kirtc_pu:2982: ākāśasya prākkāryatvenoktervibhutvāsambhavādatrānyabhūtāpekṣayā visṛtatve 'pi yathā viśiṣṭena śabdātmanā guṇena tadgṛhyate yogibhiśca svīkriyate/
GR13kirtc_pu:2987: yathā sā viṣaśabdavācyā māraṇaśaktirasmadādibhirgṛhyate tathaivātmaśabdavācyo jñānakriyātmako
GR13kirtc_pu:2988: guṇaḥ sūkṣmadehaśabdenaiva vācyaśca bhogasādhanātmaka āgamamantraśaktyā gṛhyate saṃskriyate
GR13kirtc_pu:2997: vipadyeteti śabdabhāṣaṇayogānyathaiva mantrā vācakā api ca mantraśabdenocyante/
